params.String: sets fog distance to 20 near, 30 far
Sets the draw distance of the fog.
The fog begins generating at 'CameraFogNear' units
away from the camera and becomes completely opaque
at 'CameraFogFar' units away from the camera.
Should be set to a value between 0.0 and 2.0.
